text: @KDscribe @himantabiswa @narendramodi @AmitShah @Pijush_hazarika There are lot of difference between Kerala and Assam if we consider the funds and other factors for implementing model to fight covid19. But from the day 1 Assam has done extra ordinary hard work to get prepared for today and that we should appreciate the management and the team
